description: TEHRAN – In a significant meeting between the highest echelons of Iran's Armed Forces, senior commanders emphatically declared the nation's preparedness to deliver further decisive blows against its adversaries.
title: Iran’s military leadership declares full readiness for further strikes against Israel

description: TEHRAN – Israel likely believed it would rally the public support it failed to gain during the 12-day Iran-Israel war by sharing pictures of a female Israeli soldier writing "Mahsa Amini" on munitions destined for strikes against Iran. However, the move provoked mixed reactions—but not support—with many Iranians now questioning Israel’s role in the 2022 violence that shook Iran.
title: 'How many Iranian women did you kill with those bombs?'

description: TEHRAN - Each year, the Florida Museum of Photographic Arts (FMoPA) celebrates photographic excellence from around the world through its International Photography Competition. The winning works are featured in an exhibition underway at the museum, with three photos by Iranian artists Majid Hojati and Armin Amirian among them.
title: Works of Iranian artists at FMoPA International Photography Competition exhibition

description: TEHRAN – The prospects for new negotiations between Iran and the United States remain dim for the foreseeable future after President Donald Trump bombed Iran last month during ongoing talks that had begun in April, leading Tehran’s leaders to conclude the Republican administration has no genuine interest in a deal.
title: No talks for now

description: TEHRAN – France, the United Kingdom, and Germany have threatened to trigger the UN snapback mechanism against Iran by the end of August unless "substantial progress" is made in restoring the nuclear deal, French Foreign Minister Jean-Noel Barrot declared on Tuesday.
title: France drives snapback threat, jeopardizing Europe’s future role on Iran

description: TEHRAN – Hojatoleslam Mohammad Mohammadi-Golpayegani, Head of the Leader of the Islamic Revolution's Office, and Armed Forces Chief of Staff Major General Abdolrahim Mousavi paid a visit on Thursday to the family of IRGC Chief Major General Hossein Salami, martyred on June 13 at the onset of the Israeli regime's 12-day war on Iran.
title: Ayatollah Khamenei’s envoy conveys his condolences to General Salami's family

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Ministry's Director General for South Asia, Mohammad-Reza Bahrami, expressed profound grief Thursday over catastrophic flooding in Pakistan that has killed over 170 people, including 85 children.
title: Tehran offers condolences to flood-ravaged Pakistan

description: TEHRAN- In an exclusive interview with the Tehran Times, Aidan Jonah, editor-in-chief of The Canada Files, delivers an incisive critique of Canada’s role in perpetuating Western imperialist agendas, particularly against Iran.
title: Exclusive: Independent journalist says Canada’s posture on Iran 'serves US and Israeli interests'

description: TEHRAN — The recent resurgence of violent clashes between Druze fighters and Bedouin tribes in Syria’s southern Suwayda province has once again been cynically exploited by Israel to justify its hostile interventions in the country.
title: Israel’s aggression in Syria fuels drive to ‘change the Middle East’

description: BEIRUT— Given the March horrific massacres on the Syrian coast and recently in Suwayda has it become legitimate to ask that partition is becoming a reality in Syria? The mosaic of partition is leading to the construction of de facto authorities that are separate and isolated from each other.
title: Syria’s bloody events: Dividing the divided

description: TEHRAN - In an analysis, Jam-e-Jam addressed Israel's goals that Israel sought in its start of war against Iran in June.
title: Goals that failed

description: Claudio Lefschitz, a former senior agent of Argentina’s intelligence agency (SIDE), served as deputy to former judge Juan José Galeano—the corrupt judge in charge of the AMIA case in Argentina’s judiciary.
title: Claudio Lefschitz’s interview on the AMIA Case

description: TEHRAN — Iran has categorically rejected recent U.S. accusations that it is supplying military equipment to Yemen, describing the allegations as an attempt to divert public attention from the root causes of instability in West Asia—chiefly the Israeli regime’s escalating crimes against regional nations.
title: ‘US, Israel main sources of regional instability’, Iran rejects claims of arming Yemen

description: TEHRAN — The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) has strongly condemned the killing of two Iranian media workers in last month’s Israeli airstrike on the headquarters of the Islamic Republic of Iran Broadcasting (IRIB) in Tehran.
title: UNESCO condemns Israeli strike on IRIB headquarters as violation of international law

description: Hamas has accused Israel of pursuing a “policy of mass starvation” against Palestinians in what it says is a “crime against humanity”, amid warnings from health officials in the territory about growing numbers of starving civilians seeking help, Al Jazeera reported.
title: Hamas: Israel pursuing ‘policy of mass starvation’ in Gaza

description: An Israeli combat veteran has urged Tel Aviv to quickly address concerns of soldiers returning from the war in Gaza, amid reports of increasing suicide rates.
title: Israeli combat veteran raises alarm over increasing suicide of soldiers since October 7

description: The Israeli public is being “fed lies” about the progress made against Hamas, a senior military commander has said, warning the Palestinian movement will not be defeated for years.
title: Commander: Israeli public ‘fed lies’ about defeating Hamas

description: TEHRAN – The Israeli occupation regime’s deadly shelling of Gaza’s Catholic church has sparked widespread condemnation.
title: Gaza church attack reflects genocide

description: TEHRAN – Mohammad Mahdi Rahmati, the CEO of Mehr Media Group (which consists of Mehr News Agency and English-language daily Tehran Times) emphasized the vital role of media in providing independent narratives to prevent distortion of the truth within mainstream outlets during the seventh BRICS Media and Think Tank Forum in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on Thursday.
title: Mehr CEO calls for independent media narratives to counter global distortions at BRICS conference

description:
An exhibition of paintings by Mehdi Movahedi is underway at Kavin Gallery.
The exhibit named “Suspended Body” will be running until July 25 at the gallery located at No.24, Pesian St. Zaferanieh Neighborhood.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN – Iran lost to defending champions Japan 40-27 in 2025 Asian Women's Youth Handball Championship on Friday.
title: Iran lose to Japan in 2025 Asian Women's Youth Handball Championship

description: TEHRAN — Reza Hemmati, Deputy Head of Tehran’s Tourism Department, has announced the issuance of medical tourism permits to 10 travel agencies in Tehran.
title: Medical tourism permits issued for 10 travel agencies in Tehran

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Deputy Minister of Cultural Heritage, Maryam Jalali Dehkordi, has said Isfahan’s Chahar Bagh Boulevard is a historical memory of the nation and a mirror of Isfahan culture.
title: Chahar Bagh Boulevard: historical memory of nation and mirror of Isfahan culture

description: TEHRAN — Isfahan Municipality is set to officially unveil the spiritual tourism routes of Isfahan, highlighting saqqakhanehs (traditional places providing water to the passersby), seminaries, and mosques located within the city’s ancient bazaar, said Alireza Massah, who presides over the municipality’s tourism office.
title: First spiritual tourism roadmap for Isfahan bazaar planned

description: TEHRAN – A ceremony honoring supporters of handwritten manuscripts will be held in Tehran in February 2026 under the slogan “Yesterday’s Heritage, Today’s Thought.”
title: Tehran ceremony to honor devotees of manuscript culture

description: TEHRAN -- Iran is considering an extension of its highly acclaimed cultural exhibition, “Land of Kindness”, currently on display in China, following a formal request from Chinese officials, according to Ali Darabi, Iran’s Deputy Minister of Cultural Heritage.
title: Iran considers extending ‘Land of Kindness’ exhibition in China following high demand

description: The world of archaeology has lost one of its most influential figures: Brian Fagan, often hailed as the father of public archaeology, has passed away.
title: Sad news for the world of archaeology: Brian Fagan, father of public archaeology, passed away

description: TEHRAN – Iran basketball team will face Egypt in the opening match of the four-team tournament in Beirut.
title: Iran’s fixtures in Lebanon basketball tournament revealed
Aidan Jonah the Editor-in-Chief of The Canada Files in interview with Tehran Times
Canada Echoes U.S. Policy, Enabling Israeli Regional Strategy

description: TEHRAN –The Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Minister, Sattar Hashemi, and the Iraqi ambassador to Tehran, Naseer Abdul Mohsen Abdullah, have discussed ways to expand technological cooperation between the two countries.
title: Iranian, Iraqi officials discuss enhancing technological ties

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s National Home Appliance Manufacturers Association is drafting a strategic export plan as its top priority for the year, aiming to lift the industry out of prolonged stagnation, the association’s secretary general said.
title: Home appliance industry eyes strategic export plan to revive sector

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s petrochemical industry remains committed to achieving its development goals for the current year, despite disruptions caused by a 12-day conflict triggered by Israeli airstrikes, a senior official said.
title: Petrochemical sector stays on track despite conflict, eyes annual targets

description: TEHRAN- Iran imported non-oil commodities valued at $354 million from Russia during the first quarter of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21-June 21), according to the head of the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA).
title: Iran imports non-oil goods worth $354m from Russia in a quarter

description: TEHRAN – Iran has increased crude oil production by 38,000 barrels per day (bpd) at its South Azadegan oilfield over the past 10 months, following the successful drilling and completion of 17 wells, the head of Petropars, the company developing the field, said.
title: Iran boosts oil output by 38,000 bpd at South Azadegan field

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s largest solar power plant located in central Tehran is nearing completion and will soon come online as part of a sweeping national push to expand renewable energy, a senior official said.
title: Tehran to launch capital’s largest solar power plant amid national renewables push

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) has announced its readiness to dispatch humanitarian aid to help individuals affected by floods in Pakistan.
title: IRCS ready to send relief aid to flood-stricken people in Pakistan

description: TEHRAN – Vice-President for Women and Family Affairs, Zahra Behrouz-Azar, has called on the United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) office in Iran to condemn the Israeli military attacks against Iran and pursue the violation of children’s rights during the 12-day aggression.
title: VP urges UNICEF to pursue violation of children’s rights in Israeli aggression

description: TEHRAN – Iran defeated Japan in straight sets (25-20, 25-22, 25-19) in the 2nd Asian U16 Men’s Volleyball Championship on Friday.
title: Iran into 2025 Asian U16 Volleyball Championship final

description: TEHRAN – Interior Minister Eskandar Momeni has said the country is not planning to deport documented and authorized refugees.
title: Authorized refugees won’t be deported: interior minister

description: TEHRAN - Iranian striker Mehdi Taremi has come to terms with his situation and is now preparing for an imminent exit from Inter Milan.
title: Mehdi Taremi ready for Inter Milan exit

description: TEHRAN – Fatemeh Ahi, a painter and creator of the artwork “Flowers and National Symbols of the World,” says: “This painting is a symbol—a message advocating peace, friendship, and respect—not just toward nature, but also toward one another. We live in a world deeply thirsty for dialogue, serenity, and coexistence.”
title: “Flowers and National Symbols of the World”: an artwork for the promotion of peace and friendship

description: TEHRAN- At midnight on Friday, 13 June 2025, just two days before a new round of Iran-U.S. negotiations to diplomatically resolve the Iranian nuclear issue, Netanyahu launched a surprise attack on Iran that had been years in the making.
title: Do not count your chickens before they hatch: War surprises for Netanyahu, and by extension for Trum

description: TEHRAN- At midnight on Friday, 13 June 2025, just two days before a new round of Iran-U.S. negotiations to diplomatically resolve the Iranian nuclear issue, Netanyahu launched a surprise attack on Iran that had been years in the making.
title: Don't count your chickens before they hatch: War surprises for Netanyahu, and by extension for Trump
